1.text: Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā manoseṭṭhā manomayā\nManasā ce paduṭṭhena bhāsati vā karoti vā\nTato naṃ dukkhamanveti cakkaṃ va vahato padaṃ

2.text: Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā manoseṭṭhā manomayā\nManasā ce pasannena bhāsati vā karoti vā\nTato naṃ sukhaṃ anveti chāyā va anapāyinī

3.text: Akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ ajini maṃ ahāsi me\nYe taṃ upanayhanti veraṃ tesaṃ na sammati

4.text: Akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ ajini maṃ ahāsi me\nYe taṃ na upanayhanti veraṃ tesūpasammati

5.text: Na hi verena verāni sammantīdha kudācanaṃ\nAverena ca sammanti esa dhammo sanantano

6.text: Pare ca na vijānanti mayaṃ ettha yamāmase\nYe ca tattha vijānanti tato sammanti medhagā

7.text: Subhānupassiṃ viharantaṃ indriyesu asaṃvutaṃ\nBhojanambhi amattaññuṃ kusītaṃ hīnavīriyaṃ\nTaṃ ve pasahati māro vāto rukkhaṃ va dubbalaṃ

8.text: Asubhānupassiṃ viharantaṃ indriyesu susaṃvutaṃ\nBhojanambhi ca mattaññuṃ saddhaṃ āraddhavīriyaṃ\nTaṃ ve nappasahati māro vāto selaṃ va pabbataṃ

9.text: Anikkasāvo kāsāvaṃ yo vatthaṃ paridahessati\nApeto damasaccena na so kāsāvaṃ arahati

10.text: Yo ca vantakasāvassa sīlesu susamāhito\nUpeto damasaccena sa ve kāsāvaṃ arahati

11.text: Asāre sāramatino sāre cāsāradassino\nTe sāraṃ nādhigacchanti micchāsaṃkappagocarā

12.text: Sārañca sārato ñatvā asārañca asārato\nTe sāraṃ adhigacchanti sammāsaṃkappagocarā

13.text: Yathāgāraṃ ducchannaṃ vuṭṭhi samativijjhati\nEvaṃ abhāvitaṃ cittaṃ rāgo samativijjhati

14.text: Yathāgāraṃ succhannaṃ vuṭṭhi na samativijjhati\nEvaṃ subhāvitaṃ cittaṃ rāgo na samativijjhati

15.text: Idha socati pecca socati pāpakārī ubhayattha socati\nSo socati so vihaññati disvā kamma kiliṭṭhamattano

16.text: Idha modati pecca modati katapuñño ubhayattha modati\nSo modati so pamodati disvā kamma visuddhimattano

17.text: Idha tappati pecca tappati pāpakārī ubhayattha tappati\nPāpaṃ me katanti tappati bhiyyo tappati duggatiṃ gato

18.text: Idha nandati pecca nandati pāpakārī ubhayattha nandati\nPāpaṃ me katanti nandati bhiyyo nandati suggatiṃ gato

19.text:
Bahumpi ce sahitaṃ bhāsamāno
Na takkaro hoti naro pamatto
Gopo va gāvo gaṇayaṃ paresaṃ
Na bhāgavā sāmaññassa hoti

20.text:
Appampi ce sahitaṃ bhāsamāno
Dhammassa hoti anudhammacārī
Rāgañca dosañca pahāya mohaṃ
Sammappajāno suvimuttacitto
Anupādiyāno idha vā huraṃ vā
Sa bhāgavā sāmaññassa hoti

21.text: Appamādo amatapadaṃ pamādo maccuno padaṃ\nAppamattā na mīyanti ye pamattā yathā matā

22.text: Etaṃ visesato ñatvā appamādamhi paṇḍitā\nAppamāde pamodanti ariyānaṃ gocare ratā

23.text: Te jhāyino sātatikā niccaṃ daḷhaparakkamā\nPhusanti dhīrā nibbāṇaṃ yogakkhemaṃ anuttaraṃ

24.text: Uṭṭhānavato satimato sucikammassa nisammakārino\nSaññatassa ca dhammajīvino appamattassa yaso bhivaḍḍhati

25.text: Uṭṭhānenappamādena saññamena damena ca\nDīpaṃ kayirātha medhāvī yaṃ ogho nābhikīrati

26.text: Pamādamanuyuñjanti bālā dummedhino janā\nAppamādañca medhāvi dhanaṃ seṭṭhaṃ va rakkhati

27.text: Mā pamādamanuyuñjetha mā kāmarati santhavaṃ\nAppamatto hi jhāyanto pappoti vipulaṃ sukhaṃ

28.text: Pamādaṃ appamādena yadā nudati paṇḍito\nPaññāpāsādamāruyha asoko sokiniṃ pajaṃ\nPabbataṭṭho va bhummaṭṭhe dhīro bāle avekkhati

29.text: Appamatto pamattesu suttesu bahujāgaro\nAbalassaṃ va sīghasso hitvā yāti sumedhaso

30.text: Appamādena maghavā devānaṃ seṭṭhataṃ gato\nAppamādaṃ pasaṃsanti pamādo garahito sadā

31.text: Appamādarato bhikkhu pamāde bhaya dassivā\nSaṃyojanaṃ aṇuṃ thūlaṃ ḍahaṃ aggīva gacchati

32.text: Appamādarato bhikkhu pamāde bhaya dassivā\nAbhabbo parihāṇāya nibbāṇasseva santike

33.text: Phandanaṃ capalaṃ cittaṃ durakkhaṃ dunnivārayaṃ\nUjuṃ karoti medhāvī usukāro va tejanaṃ

34.text: Vārijo va thale khitto okamokata ubbhato\nPariphandatidaṃ cittaṃ māradheyyaṃ pahātave

35.text: Dunniggahassa lahuno yatthakāmanipātino\nCittassa damatho sādhu cittaṃ dantaṃ sukhāvahaṃ

36.text: Sududdasaṃ sunipunaṃ yatthakāmanipātinaṃ\nCittaṃ rakkhetha medhāvī cittaṃ guttaṃ sukhāvahaṃ

37.text: Dūraṅgamaṃ ekacaraṃ asarīraṃ kuhāsayaṃ\nYe cittaṃ saññamessanti mokkhanti mārabandhanā

38.text: Anavaṭṭhitacittassa saddhammaṃ avijānato\nParipalavapasādassa paññā na paripūrati

40.text: Kumbhūpamaṃ kāyamimaṃ viditvā nagarūpamaṃ cittamidaṃ ṭhapetvā\nYodhetha māraṃ paññāyudhena jitañca rakkhe anivesano siyā

41.text: Aciraṃ vatayaṃ kāyo paṭhaviṃ adhisessati\nChuddho apetaviññāṇo niratthaṃ va kaliṅgaraṃ

42.text: Diso disaṃ yantaṃ kayirā verī vā pana verinaṃ\nMicchāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ pāpiyo naṃ tato kare

43.text: Na taṃ mātā pitā kayirā aññe vā pi ca ñātakā\nSammāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ seyyaso naṃ tato kare

44.text:
Ko imaṃ paṭhaviṃ vicessati
Yamalokañca imaṃ sadevakaṃ
Ko dhammapadaṃ sudesitaṃ
Kusalo pupphamiva pacessati

45.text:
Sekho paṭhaviṃ vicessati
Yamalokañca imaṃ sadevakaṃ
Sekho dhammapadaṃ sudesitaṃ
Kusalo pupphamiva pacessati

46.text:
Pheṇūpamaṃ kāyamimaṃ viditvā
Marīcidhammaṃ abhisambudhāno
Chetvāna mārassa papupphakāni
Adassanaṃ maccurājassa gacche

47.text: Pupphāni heva pacinantaṃ byāsattamanasaṃ naraṃ\nSuttaṃ gāmaṃ mahogho va maccu ādāya gacchati

48.text: Pupphāni heva pacinantaṃ byāsattamanasaṃ naraṃ\nAtittaṃ yeva kāmesu antako kurute vasaṃ

49.text: Yathāpi bhamaro pupphaṃ vaṇṇagandhaṃ aheṭhayaṃ\nPaḷeti rasamādāya evaṃ gāme munī care

50.text: Na paresaṃ vilomāni na paresaṃ katākataṃ\nAttano va avekkheyya katāni akatāni ca

51.text: Yathāpi ruciraṃ pupphaṃ vaṇṇavantaṃ agandhakaṃ\nEvaṃ subhāsitā vācā aphalā hoti akubbato

52.text: Yathāpi ruciraṃ pupphaṃ vaṇṇavantaṃ sagandhakaṃ\nEvaṃ subhāsitā vācā saphalā hoti pakubbato

53.text: Yathāpi ppupharāsimhā kayirā mālākuṇe bahū\nEvaṃ jātena maccena kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ bahuṃ

54.text: Na pupphagandho paṭivātameti na candanaṃ tagaramallikā vā\nSatañca gandho paṭivātameti sabbā disā sappuriso pavāti

55.text: Candanaṃ tagaraṃ vāpi uppalaṃ atha vassikī\nEtesaṃ gandhajātānaṃ sīlagandho anuttaro

56.text: Appamatto ayaṃ gandho yāyaṃ tagaracandanī\nYo ca sīlavataṃ gandho vāti devesu uttamo

57.text: Tesaṃ sampannasīlānaṃ appamādavihārinaṃ\nSammadaññā vimuttānaṃ māro maggaṃ na vindati

58.text: Yathā saṅkāradhānasmiṃ ujjhitasmiṃ mahāpathe\nPadumaṃ tattha jāyetha sucigandhaṃ manoramaṃ

59.text: Evaṃ saṅkārabhūtesu andhabhūte puthujjane\nAtirocati paññāya sammāsambuddhasāvako

60.text: Dīghā jāgarato ratti dīghaṃ santassa yojanaṃ\nDīgho bālānaṃ saṃsāro saddhamma avijānataṃ

61.text: Carañce nādhigaccheyya seyyaṃ sadisamattano\nEkacariyaṃ daḷhaṃ kayirā natthi bāle sahāyatā

62.text: Puttā matthi dhanammatthi iti bālo vihaññati\nAttā hi attano natthi kuto puttā kuto dhanaṃ

63.text: Yo bālo maññati bālyaṃ paṇaḍito vā pi tena so\nBālo ca paṇḍitamānī sa ve bālo ti vuccati

64.text: Yāvajīvampi ce bālo vaṇḍitaṃ payirupāsati\nNa so dhammaṃ vijānāti dabbī sūparasaṃ yathā

65.text: Muhuttampi ce viñgñu paṇḍitaṃ payirupāsati\nKhippaṃ dhammaṃ vijānāti jivhā sūparasaṃ yathā

66.text: Caranti bālā dummedhā amitteneva attanā\nKarontā pāpakaṃ kammaṃ yaṃ hoti kaṭukapphalaṃ

67.text: Na taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ sādhu yaṃ katvā nānutappati\nYassa assumukho rodaṃ vipākaṃ paṭisevati

68.text: Tañca kammaṃ kataṃ sādhu yaṃ katvā nānutappati\nYassa patīto sumano vipākaṃ paṭisevati

69.text: Madhuvā maññati bālo yāva pāpaṃ na paccati\nYadā ca paccati pāpaṃ atha bālo dukkhaṃ nigacchati

70.text: Māse māse kusaggena bālo bhuñjetha bhojanaṃ\nNa so saṅkhatadhammānaṃ kalaṃ agghati soḷasiṃ

71.text: Na hi pāpaṃ kataṃ kamma sajju khīraṃ va muccati\nḌahantaṃ bālamanveti bhasmacchanno va pāvako

72.text: Yāvadeva anatthāya ñattaṃ bālassa jāyati\nHanti bālassa sukkaṃsaṃ muddhamassa vipātayaṃ

73.text: Asataṃ bhāvanamiccheyya purekkhārañca bhikkhusu\nĀvāsesu ca issariyaṃ pūjā parakulesu ca

74.text: Mameva kataṃ maññantū gihī pabbajitā ubho\nMameva ativasā assu kiccākiccesu kismici\nIti bālassa saṃkappo icchā māno ca vaḍḍhati

75.text: Aññā hi lābhūpanisā aññā nibbānagāminī\nEvametaṃ abhiññāya bhikkhu buddhassa sāvako\nSakkāraṃ nābhinandeyya vivekamanubrūhaye

76.text: Nidhinaṃ va pavattāraṃ yaṃ passe vajjadassinaṃ\nNiggayhavādiṃ medhāviṃ tādisaṃ paṇḍitaṃ bhaje\nTādisaṃ bhajamānassa seyyo hoti na pāpiyo

77.text: Ovadeyyanusāseyya asabbhā ca nivāraye\nSataṃ hi so piyo hoti asataṃ hoti appiyo

78.text: Na bhaje pāpake mitte na bhaje purisādhame\nBhajetha mitte kalyāṇe bhajetha purisuttame

79.text: Dhammapīti sukhaṃ seti vippasannena tejasā\nAriyappavedite dhamme sadā ramati paṇḍito

80.text: Udakaṃ hi nayanti nettikā usukārā namayanti tejanaṃ\nDāruṃ namayanti tacchakā attānaṃ damayanti paṇḍitā

81.text: Selo yathā ekaghano vātena na samīrati\nEvaṃ nindāpasaṃsāsu na samiñjanti paṇḍitā

82.text: Yathāpi rahado gambhīro vippasanno anāvilo\nEvaṃ dhammāni sutvāna vippasīdanti paṇḍitā

83.text: Sabbattha ve sappurisā cajanti na kāmakāmā lapayanti santo\nSukhena phuṭṭhā atha vā dukhena noccāvacaṃ paṇḍitā dassayanti

84.text:
Na attahetu na parassa hetu
Na puttamicche na dhanaṃ na raṭṭhaṃ
Na iccheyya adhammena samiddhimattano
Sa sīlavā paññavā dhammiko siyā

85.text: Appakā te manussesu ye janā pāragāmino\nAthāyaṃ itarā pajā tīramevānudhāvati

86.text: Ye ca kho sammadakkhāte dhamme dhammānuvattino\nTe janā pāramessanti maccudheyyaṃ suduttaraṃ

87.text: Kaṇhaṃ dhammaṃ vippahāya sukkaṃ bhāvetha paṇḍito\nOkā anokaṃ āgamma viveke yattha dūramaṃ

88.text: Tatrābhiratimiccheyya hitvā kāme akiñcano\nPariyodapeyya attānaṃ cittaklesehi paṇḍito

89.text: Yesaṃ sambodhiaṅgesu sammā cittaṃ subhāvitaṃ\nĀdānapaṭinissagge anupādāya ye ratā\nKhīṇāsavā jutimanto te loke parinibbutā

90.text: Gataddhino visokassa vippamuttassa sabbadhi\nSabbaganthappahīṇassa pariḷāho na vijjati

91.text: Uyyuñjanti satimanto na nikete ramanti te\nHaṃsā va pallalaṃ hitvā okamoka jahanti te

92.text: Yesaṃ sannicayo natthi ye pariññātabhojanā\nSuññato animitto ca vimokkho yesa gocarā\nĀkāse va sakuntānaṃ gati tesaṃ durannayā

93.text: Yassāsavā parikkhīṇā āhāre ca anissito\nSuññato animitto ca vimokkho yassa gocaro\nĀkāse va sakuntānaṃ padaṃ tassa durannayaṃ

94.text: Yassindriyāni samathaṃ gatāni assā yathā sārathinā sudantā \r\nPahīṇamānassa anāsavassa \r\nDevā pi tassa pihayanti tādino

95.text: Paṭhavisamo no virujjhati indakhīlūpamo tādi subbato\nRahado va apetakaddamo saṃsārā na bhavanti tādino

96.text: Santaṃ tassa manaṃ hoti santā vācā ca kamma ca\nSammadaññā vimuttassa upasantassa tādino

97.text: Assaddho akataññū ca sandhicchedo ca yo naro\nHatāvakāso vantāso sa ve uttamaporiso

98.text: Gāme vā yadi vā raññe ninne vā yadi vā thale\nYatthārahanto viharanti taṃ bhūviṃ rāmaṇeyyakaṃ

99.text: Ramaṇīyāni araññāni yattha na ramatī jano \r\nVītarāgā ramissanti na te kāmagavesino

100.text: Sahassampi ce vācā anatthapadasaṃhitā\nEkaṃ atthapadaṃ seyyo yaṃ sutvā upasammati

101.text: Sahassampi ce gāthā antthapadasaṃhitā\nEkaṃ gāthāpadaṃ seyyā yaṃ sutvā upasammati

102.text: Yo ce gāthāsataṃ bhāse anatthapadasaṃhitaṃ\nEkaṃ dhammapadaṃ seyyā yaṃ sutvā upasammati

103.text: Yo sahassaṃ sahassena saṅgāme mānuse jine\nEkañca jeyya attānaṃ sa ve saṅgāmajuttamo

104.text: Attā have jitaṃ seyyo yā cāyaṃ itarā pajā\nAttadantassa posassa niccaṃ saññatacārino

105.text: Neva devo na gandhabbo na māro saha brahmunā\nJitaṃ apajitaṃ kayirā tathārūpassa jantuno

106.text: Māse māse sahassena yo yajetha sataṃ samaṃ\nEkañca bhāvitattānaṃ muhuttampi pūjaye\nSā yeva pūjanā seyyā yañce vassasataṃ hutaṃ

107.text: Yo ca vassasataṃ jantu aggiṃ paricare vane\nEkañca bhāvitattānaṃ muhuttampi pūjaye\nSā yeva pūjanā seyyā yañce vassasataṃ hutaṃ

108.text:
Yaṃ kiñci yiṭṭhaṃ va hutaṃ va loke
Saṃvaccharaṃ yajetha puññapekkho
Sabbampi taṃ na catubhāgameti
Abhivādanā ujjugatesu seyyā

109.text: Abhivādanasīlissa niccaṃ vaddhāpacāyino\nCattārā dhammā vaḍḍhanti āyu vaṇṇo sukhaṃ balaṃ

110.text: Yo ca vassasataṃ jīve dussīlo asamāhito\nEkāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo sīlavantassa jhāyino

111.text: Yo ca vassasataṃ jīve duppañño asamāhito\nEkāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo paññavantassa jhāyino

112.text: Yo ca vassasataṃ jīve kusīto hīnavīriyo\nEkāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo viriyamārabhato daḷhaṃ

113.text: Yo ca vassasataṃ jīve apassaṃ udayavyayaṃ\nEkāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo passato udayavyayaṃ

114.text: Yo ca vassasataṃ jīve apassaṃ amataṃ padaṃ\nEkāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo passato amataṃ padaṃ

115.text: Yo ca vassasataṃ jīve apassaṃ dhammamuttamaṃ\nEkāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo passato dhammamuttamaṃ

116.text: Abhitvaretha kalyāṇe pāpā cittaṃ nivāraye\nDandhaṃ hi karoto puññaṃ pāpasmiṃ ramatī mano

117.text: Pāpaṃ ce puriso kayirā na taṃ kayirā punappunaṃ\nNa tamhi chandaṃ kayirātha dukkho pāpassa uccayo

118.text: Puññaṃ ce puriso kayirā kayirāthetaṃ punappunaṃ\nTamhi chandaṃ kayirātha sukho puññassa uccayo

119.text: Pāpo pi passati bhadraṃ yāva pāpaṃ na paccati\nYadā ca paccati pāpaṃ atha pāpo pāpāni passati

120.text: Bhadro pi passati pāpaṃ yāva bhadraṃ na paccati\nYadā ca paccati bhadraṃ atha bhadro bhadrāni passati

121.text: Mā pamaññetha pāpassa na mantaṃ āgamissati\nUdabindunipātena udakumbho pi pūrati\nPūrati bālo pāpassa thokathokampi ācinaṃ

122.text: Mā pamaññetha puññassa na maṃ taṃ āgamissati\nUdabindunipātena udakumbho pi pūrati\nPūrati dhīro puññassa thokathokampi ācinaṃ

123.text: Vāṇijo va bhayaṃ maggaṃ appasattho mahaddhano\nVisaṃ jīvitukāmo va pāpāni parivajjaye

124.text: Pāṇimhi ce vaṇo nāssa hareyya pāṇinā visaṃ\nNābbaṇaṃ visamanveti natthi pāpaṃ akubbato

125.text:
Yo appaduṭṭhassa narassa dussati
Suddhassa posassa anaṅgaṇassa
Tameva bālaṃ pacceti pāpaṃ
Sukhumo rajo paṭivātaṃ va khitto

126.text: Gabbhameke papajjanti nirayaṃ pāpakammino\nSaggaṃ sugatino yanti parinibbanti anāsavā

127.text:
Na antalikkhe na samuddamajajhe
Na pabbatānaṃ vivaraṃ pavissa
Na vijjatī so jagatippadeso
Yatthaṭthito mucceyya pāpakammā

128.text:
Na antalikkhe na samuddamajajhe
Na pabbatānaṃ vivaraṃ pavissa
Na vijjati so jagatippadeso
Yatthaṭthitaṃ nappasahetha maccu

129.text: Sabbe tasanti daṇaḍassa sabbe bhāyanti maccuno\nAttānaṃ upamaṃ katvā na haneyya na ghātaye

130.text: Sabbe tasanti daṇaḍassa sabbesaṃ jīvitaṃ piyaṃ\nAttānaṃ upamaṃ katvā na haneyya na ghātaye

131.text: Sukhakāmāni bhūtāni yodaṇḍena vihiṃsati\nAttano sukhamesāno pecca so na labhate sukhaṃ

132.text: Sukhakāmāni bhūtāni yodaṇḍena na hiṃsati\nAttano sukhamesāno pecca so labhate sukhaṃ

133.text: Mā voca pharusaṃ kañci vuttā paṭivadeyyu taṃ\nDukkhā hi sārambhakathā paṭidaṇḍā phuseyyu taṃ

134.text: Sa ce neresi attānaṃ kaṃso upahato yathā\nEsa patto si nibbāṇaṃ sārambho te na vijjati

135.text: Yathā daṇḍena gopālo gā pāceti gocaraṃ\nEvaṃ jarā ca maccu ca āyuṃ pācenti pāṇinaṃ

136.text: Atha pāpāni kammāni karaṃ bālo na bujjhati\nSehi kammehi dummedho aggidaḍḍho va tappati

137.text: Yo daṇḍena adaṇḍesu appaduṭṭhesu dussati\nDasannamaññataraṃ ṭhānaṃ khippameva nigacchati

138.text: Vedanaṃ pharusaṃ jāniṃ sarīrassa ca bhedanaṃ\nGarukaṃ vāpi ābādhaṃ cittakkhepaṃ va pāpuṇe

139.text: Rājato vā upassaggaṃ abbhakkhānaṃ va dāruṇaṃ\nParikkhayaṃ va ñātīnaṃ bhogānaṃ va pabhaṅguraṃ

140.text: Atha vāssa agārāni aggi ḍahati pāvako\nKāyassa bhedā duppañño nirayaṃ so upapajjati

141.text:
Na naggacariyā na jaṭā na paṅkā
Nānāsakā thaṇḍilasāyikā vā
Rājo ca jallaṃ ukkuṭikappadhānaṃ
Sodhenti maccaṃ avitiṇṇakaṅkhaṃ

142.text:
Alaṅkato ce pi samaṃ careyya
Santo danto niyato brahmacārī
Sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ
So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhu

143.text: Hirīnisedho puriso koci lokasmiṃ vijjati\nYo nindaṃ apabodhati asso bhadro kasāmiva

144.text:
Asso yathā bhadro kasāniviṭiṭho
Ātāpino saṃvegino bhavātha
Saddhāya sīlena ca vīriyena ca
Samādhinā dhammavinicchayena ca
Sampannavijjācaraṇā patissatā
Pahassatha dukkhamidaṃ anappakaṃ

145.text: Udakaṃ hi nayanti nettikā usukārā namayanti tejanaṃ\nDāruṃ namayanti tacchakā attānaṃ damayanti subbatā

146.text: Ko nu hāso kimānando niccaṃ pajjalite sati\nAndhakārena onaddhā padīpaṃ na gavessatha

147.text: Passa cittakataṃ bimbaṃ arukāyaṃ samussitaṃ\nĀturaṃ bahusaṅkappaṃ yassa natthi dhuvaṃ ṭhiti

148.text: Parijiṇṇamidaṃ rūpaṃ roganiḍḍhaṃ pabhaṅguraṃ\nBhijjati pūtisandeho maraṇantaṃ hi jīvitaṃ

149.text: Yānimāni apatthāni alāpūneva sārade\nKāpotakāni aṭṭhīni tāni disvāna kā rati

150.text: Aṭṭhīnaṃ nagaraṃ kataṃ maṃsalohitalepanaṃ\nYattha jarā ca maccu ca māno makkho ca ohito

151.text:
Jīranti ve rāja rathā sucittā
Atho sarīrampi jaraṃ upeti
Satañca dhammo na jaraṃ upeti
Santo have sabbhi pavedayanti

152.text: Appassutāyaṃ puriso balivaddo va jīrati\nMaṃsāni tassa vaḍḍhanti paññā tassa na vaḍḍhati

153.text: Anekajāti saṃsāraṃ sandhāvissaṃ anibbisaṃ\nGahakārakaṃ gavesanto dukkhā jāti punappunaṃ

154.text: Gahakāraka diṭṭho si puna gehaṃ na kāhasi\nSabbā te phāsukā bhaggā gahakauṭaṃ visaṅkhitaṃ\nVisaṅkhāragataṃ cittaṃ taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā

155.text: Acaritvā brahmacariyaṃ aladdhā yobbane dhanaṃ\nJiṇṇakoñcā, va jhāyanti khīṇamaccheva pallale

156.text: Acaritvā brahmacariyaṃ aladdhā yobbane dhanaṃ\nSenti cāpā tikhittā va purāṇāni anutthunaṃ

157.text: Attānaṃ ce piyaṃ jaññā rakkheyya naṃ surakkhitaṃ\nTiṇṇamaññataraṃ yāmaṃ paṭijaggeyya paṇḍito

158.text: Attānameva paṭhamaṃ patirūpe nivesaye\nAthaññamanusāseyya na kilisseyya paṇḍito

159.text: Attānañce tathā kayirā yathaññamanusāsati\nSudanto vata dammetha attā hi kira duddamo

160.text: Attā hi attano nātho kohi nātho paro siyā\nAttanā va sudantena nāthaṃ labhati dullabhaṃ

161.text: Attanā va kataṃ pāpaṃ attajaṃ attasambhavaṃ\nAbhimatthati dummedhaṃ vajiraṃ vasmamayaṃ maṇiṃ

162.text: Yassa accantadussīlyaṃ māluvā sālamivotataṃ\nKaroti so tathattānaṃ yathā naṃ icchatī diso

163.text: Sukarāni asādhūni attano ahitāni ca\nYaṃ ve hitañca sādhuṃ ca taṃ ve paramadukkaraṃ

164.text: Yo sāsanaṃ arahataṃ ariyānaṃ dhammajīvinaṃ\nPaṭikkosati dummedho diṭṭhiṃ nissāya pāpikaṃ\nPhalāni kaṭṭhakasseva attaghaññāya phallati

165.text: Attanā va kataṃ pāpaṃ attanā saṃkilissati\nAttanā akataṃ pāpaṃ attanā va visujjhati\nSuddhi asuddhi paccattaṃ nāññamañño visodhaye

166.text: Attadatthaṃ paratthena bahunā pi na hāpaye\nAttadatthambhiññāya sadatthapasuto siyā

167.text: Hīnaṃ dhammaṃ na seveyya pamādena na saṃvase\nMicchādiṭṭhiṃ na seveyya na siyā lokavaddhano

168.text: Uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyya dhammaṃ sucaritaṃ care\nDhammacāri sukhaṃ seti asmiṃ loke paramhi ca

169.text: Dhammaṃ care sucaritaṃ na naṃ duccaritaṃ care\nDhammacārī sukhaṃ seti asmiṃ loke paramhi ca

170.text: Yathā bubbulakaṃ passe yathā passe marīcikaṃ\nEvaṃ lokaṃ avekkhantaṃ maccurājā na passati

171.text: Etha passathiraṃ lokaṃ cittaṃ rājarathūpamaṃ\nYattha bālā visīdanti natthi saṅgo vijānataṃ

172.text: Yo ca pubbe pamajjitvā pacchā so nappamajjati\nSo imaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti abbhā mutto va candimā

173.text: Yassa pāsaṃ kataṃ kammaṃ kusalena pithīyati\nSo imaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti abbhā mutto va candimā\n

174.text: Andhabhūto ayaṃ loko tanukettha vipassati\nSakunto jālamutto va appo saggāya gacchati

175.text: Haṃsādiccapathe yanti ākāse yanti iddhiyā\nNiyyanti dhīrā lokamhā jitvā māraṃ savāhiniṃ

176.text: Ekaṃ dhammaṃ atītassa musāvādissa jantūno\nVitiṇṇaparalokassa natthi pāpaṃ akāriyaṃ

177.text: Na ve kadariyā devalokaṃ vajanti bālā have nappasaṃsanti dānaṃ \r\nDhīro ca dānaṃ anumodamāno \r\nTeneva so hoti sūkhī parattha

178.text: Pathavyā ekarajjena saggassa gamanena vā\nSabbalokādhipaccena sotāpattiphalaṃ varaṃ

179.text: Yassa jitaṃ nāvajīyati jitamassa no yāti koci loke\nTambuddhamanantagocaraṃ apadaṃ kena padena nessatha

180.text: Yassa jālinī visattikā taṇhā natthi kuhiñci netave\nTambuddhamanantagocaraṃ apadaṃ kena padena nessatha

181.text: Ye jhānapasutā dhīrā nekkhammūpasame ratā\nDevā pi tesaṃ pihayanti sambuddhānaṃ satīmataṃ

182.text: Kiccho manussapaṭilābho kicchaṃ macchāna jīvitaṃ\nKicchaṃ saddhammasavanaṃ kiccho buddhānaṃ uppādo

183.text: Sabbapāpassa akaraṇaṃ kusalassa upasampadā\nSacittapariyodapanaṃ etaṃ buddhāna sāsanaṃ

184.text:
Khantī paramaṃ tapo titikkhā
Nibbāṇaṃ paramaṃ vadanti buddhā
Na hi pabbajito parūpaghātī
Samaṇo hoti paraṃ viheṭhayanto

185.text: Anūpavādo anūpaghāto pātimokkhe ca saṃvaro\nMattaññutā ca bhattasmiṃ pantañca sayanāsanaṃ\nAdhicitte ca āyogo etaṃ buddhāna sāsanaṃ

186.text: Na kahāpaṇavassena titti kāmesu vijjati\nAppassādā dukhā kāmā iti viññāya paṇḍito

187.text: Api dibbesu kāmesu ratiṃ so nādhigacchati\nTaṇhakkhayarato hoti sammāsambuddhasāvako

188.text: Bahū ve saraṇaṃ yanti pabbatāni vanāni ca\nĀrāmarukkhacetyāni manussā bhayatajjitā

189.text: Netaṃ kho saraṇaṃ khemaṃ netaṃ saraṇamuttamaṃ\nNetaṃ saraṇamāgamma sabbadukkhā pamuccati

190.text: Yo ca buddhañca dhammañca saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato\nCattāri ariyasaccāni sammappaññāya passati

191.text: Dukkhaṃ dukkhasamuppādaṃ dukkhassa ca atikkamaṃ\nAriyañcaṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ dukkhūpasamagāminaṃ

192.text: Etaṃ kho saraṇaṃ khemaṃ etaṃ saraṇamuttamaṃ\nEtaṃ saraṇamāgamma sabbadukkhā pamuccati

193.text: Dullabho purisājañño na so sabbattha jāyati\nYattha so jāyati dhīro taṃ kūlaṃ sukhamedhati

194.text: Sukho buddhānaṃ uppādo sukhā saddhammadesanā\nSukhā saṅghassa sāmaggi samaggānaṃ tapo sukho

195.text: Pūjārahe pūjayato buddhe yadi va sāvake\nPapañca samatikkante tiṇṇasokapariddave

196.text: Te tādise pūjayato nibbute akutobhaye\nNa sakkā puññaṃ saṅkhātuṃ imettamapi kenaci

197.text: Susukhaṃ vata jīvāma verinesu averino\nVerinesu manussesu viharāma averino

198.text: Susukhaṃ vata jīvāma āturesu anāturā\nĀturesu manussesu viharāma anāturā

199.text: Susukhaṃ vata jīvāma ussūkesu anussukā \r\nUssukesu manussesu viharāma anussukā

200.text: Susukhaṃ vata jīvāma yesaṃ no natthi kiñcanaṃ\nPītibhakkhā bhavissāma devā ābhassarā yathā

201.text: Jayaṃ veraṃ pasavati dukkhaṃ seti parājito\nUpasanto sukhaṃ seti hatmā jayaparājayaṃ

202.text: Natthi rāgasamo aggi natthi dosasamo kali\nNatthi khandhasamā dukkhā katthi santiparaṃ sukhaṃ

203.text: Jighacchāparamā rogā saṅkhāraparamā dukhā\nEtaṃ ñatvā yathābhūtaṃ nibbāṇaparamaṃ sukhaṃ

204.text: Ārogyaparamā lābhā santuṭṭhiparamaṃ dhanaṃ\nVissāsaparamā ñātī nibbāṇaparamaṃ sukhaṃ

205.text: Pavivekarasaṃ pītvā rasaṃ upasamassa ca\nNiddaro hoti nippāpo dhammapītirasaṃ pibaṃ

206.text: Sāhu dassanamariyānaṃ sannivāso sadā sukho\nAdassanena bālānaṃ niccameva sukhī siyā

207.text: Bālasaṅgatacārīhi dīghamaddhāna socati\nDukkho bālehi saṃvāso amitteneva sabbadā\nDhīro ca sukhasaṃvāso ñātīnaṃ va samāgamo

208.text:
Tasmāhi,
Dhīrañca paññca bahussutañca
Dhorayhasīlaṃ vatavantamāriyaṃ
Taṃ tādisaṃ sappurisaṃ sumedhaṃ
Bhajetha nakkhattapathaṃ va candimā

209.text: Ayoge yuñjamattānaṃ yogasmiñca ayojayaṃ\nAtthaṃ hitvā piyaggāhī pihetattānuyoginaṃ

210.text: Mā piyehi samāgañchī appiyehi kudācanaṃ\nPiyānaṃ adassanaṃ dukkhaṃ appiyānañca dassanaṃ

211.text: Tasmā piyaṃ na kayirātha piyāpāyo hi pāpako\nGanthā tesaṃ na vijjanti yesaṃ natthi piyāppiyaṃ

212.text: Piyato jāyatī soko piyato jāyatī bhayaṃ\nPiyato vippamuttassa natthi soko kuto bhayaṃ

213.text: Pemato jāyatī soko pemato jāyatī bhayaṃ\nPemato vippamuttassa natthi soko kuto bhayaṃ

214.text: Ratiyā jāyatī soko ratiyā jāyatī bhayaṃ\nRatiyā vippamuttassa natthi soko kuto bhayaṃ

215.text: Kāmato jāyatī soko kāmato jāyatī bhayaṃ\nKāmato vippamuttassa natthi soko kuto bhayaṃ

216.text: Taṇhāya jāyatī soko taṇhāya jāyatī bhayaṃ\nTaṇhāya vippamuttassa natthi soko kuto bhayaṃ

217.text: Sīladassanasampannaṃ dhammaṭṭhaṃ saccavedinaṃ\nAttano kamma kubbānaṃ taṃ jano kurute piyaṃ

218.text: Chandajāto anakkhāte manasā ca phuṭo siyā\nKāmesu ca appaṭibaddhacitto uddhaṃ soto ti vuccati

219.text: Cirappavāsiṃ purisaṃ dūrato sotthimāgataṃ\nÑātimittā suhajjā ca abhinandanti āgataṃ

220.text: Tatheva katapuññampi asmā lokā paraṃ gataṃ\nPuññāni patigaṇhanti piyaṃ ñātīva āgataṃ

221.text:
Kodhaṃ jahe vippajaheyya mānaṃ,
saṃyojanaṃ sabbamatikkameyya.
Taṃ nāmarūpasmimasajjamānaṃ
akiñcanaṃ nānupatanti dukkhā.

222.text: Tamahaṃ sārathiṃ brūmi rasmggāho itaro jano

223.text: Akkodhena jine kodhaṃ asādhuṃ sādhunā jine\nJine kadariyaṃ dānena saccena alikavādinaṃ

224.text: Saccaṃ bhaṇe na kujjheyya dajjāppasmimpi yācito\nEtehi tīhi ṭhānehi gacche devāna santike

225.text: Ahiṃsakā ye munayo niccaṃ kāyenasaṃvutā\nTe yanti accutaṃ ṭhānaṃ yattha gantvā na socare

226.text: Sadā jāgaramānānaṃ ahorattānusikkhinaṃ\nNibbāṇaṃ adhimuttānaṃ atthaṃ gacchanti āsavā

227.text: Porāṇametaṃ atula netaṃ ajjatanāmiva\nNindanti tuṇhimāsīnaṃ nindanti bahubhāṇinaṃ\nMitabhāṇimpi nindanti natthi loke anindito

228.text: Na cāhu na ca bhavissati na cetarahi vijjati\nEkantaṃ nindito poso ekantaṃ vā pasaṃsito

229.text: Yañce viññū pasaṃsanti anuvicca suve suve\nAcchiddavuttiṃ medhāviṃ paññāsīlasamāhitaṃ

230.text: Nekkhaṃ jambonadasseva ko taṃ ninditumarahati\nDevā pi naṃ pasaṃsanti brahmunā pi pasaṃsito

231.text: Kāyappakopaṃ rakkheyya kāyena saṃvuto siyā\nKāyaduccaritaṃ hitvā kāyena sucaritaṃ care

232.text: Vacīpakopaṃ rakkheyya vācāya saṃvuto siyā\nVacīduccaritaṃ hitvā vācāya sucaritaṃ care

233.text: Manopakopaṃ rakkheyya manasā saṃvuto siyā\nManoduccaritaṃ hitvā manasā sucaritaṃ care

234.text: Kāyena saṃvutā dhīrā atho vācāya saṃvutā\nManasā saṃvutā dhīrā te ve suparisaṃvutā

235.text: Paṇḍupalāso va dāni si yamapurisā pi ca taṃ upaṭṭhitā\nUyyogamukhe ca tiṭṭhasi patheyyampi ca te na vijjati

236.text: So karohi dīpamattano khippa vāyama paṇḍito bhava\nNiddhantamalo anaṅgaṇo dibbaṃ ariyabhūmimehisi

237.text: Upanītavayo ca dāni si sampayāto si yamassa santike\nVāso pi cate tthi antarā pātheyyampi ca te na vijjati

238.text: So karohi dīpamattano khippa vāyama paṇḍito bhava\nNiddhantamalo anaṅgaṇo na puna jātijaraṃ upehisi

239.text: Anupubbena medhāvī thokathokaṃ khaṇe khaṇe\nKammāro rajatasseva niddhame malamattano

240.text: Ayasā va malaṃ samuṭṭhitaṃ taduṭṭhāya tameva khādati\nEvaṃ atidhonacārinaṃ sakakammāni nayanti duggatiṃ

241.text: Asajjhāyamalā mantā anuṭṭhānamalā gharā\nMalaṃ vaṇṇassa kosajjaṃ pamādo rakkhato malaṃ

242.text: Malitthiyā duccaritaṃ maccheraṃ dadato malaṃ\nMalā ve pāpakā dhammā asmiṃ loke paramhi ca

243.text: Tato malā malataraṃ avijjā paramaṃ malaṃ\nEtaṃ malaṃ pahatvāna nimmalā hotha bhikkhavo

244.text: Sujīvaṃ ahirikena kākasūrena dhaṃsinā\nPakkhandinā pagabbhena saṃkiliṭṭhena jīvitaṃ

245.text: Hirimatā ca dujjīvaṃ niccaṃ sucigavesinā\nAlīnenāpagabbhena suddhājīvena passatā

246.text: Yo pāṇamatipāteti musāvādaṃ ca bhāsati\nLoke adinnaṃ ādiyati paradāraṃ ca gacchati

247.text: Surāmerayapānaṃ ca yo naro anuyuñjati\nIdheva poso lokasmiṃ mūlaṃ khaṇati attano

248.text: Evambho purisa jānāhi pāpadhammā asaññatā\nMā taṃ lobho adhammo ca ciraṃ dukkhāya randhayuṃ

249.text: Dadāti ve yathā saddhaṃ yathā pasādanaṃ jano\nTattha ve maṅku yo hoti paresaṃ pānabhojane\nNa so divā vā rattiṃ vā samādhiṃ adhigacchati

250.text: Yassa cetaṃ samucchannaṃ mūlaghaccaṃ samūhataṃ\nSa ve divā vā rattiṃ vā samādhiṃ adhigacchati

251.text: Natthi rāgasamo aggi natthi dosasamo gaho\nNatthi mohasamaṃ jālaṃ natthi taṇhāsamā nadī

252.text: Sudassaṃ vajjamaññesaṃ attano pana duddasaṃ\nParesaṃ hi so vajjāni opuṇāti yathā bhūsaṃ\nAttano pana chādeti kaliṃ va kitavā saṭho

253.text: Paravajjānupassissa niccaṃ ujjhānasaññino\nĀsavā tassa vaḍḍhanti ārā so āsavakkhayā

254.text: Ākāse padaṃ natthi samaṇo natthi bāhire\nPapañcābhiratā pajā nippapañcā tathāgatā

255.text: Ākāse padaṃ natthi samaṇo natthi bāhire\nSaṅkhārā sassatā natthi natthi buddhānaṃ iñjitaṃ

256.text: Na tena hoti dhammaṭṭho yenatthaṃ sahasā naye\nYo ca atthaṃ anatthañca ubho niccheyya paṇḍito

257.text: Asāhasena dhammena samena nayatī pare\nDhammassa gutto medhāvī dhammaṭṭho ti pavuccati

258.text: Na tena paṇḍito hoti yāvatā bahu bhāsati\nKhemī averī abhayo paṇḍito ti pavuccati

259.text: Na tāvatā dhammadharā yāvatā bahu bhāsati\nYo ca appampi sutvāna dhammaṃ kāyena passati\nSa ve dhammadharo hoti yo dhammaṃ nappamajjati

260.text: Na tena thero hoti yenassa palitaṃ siro\nParipakko vayo tassa moghajiṇṇo ti vuccati

261.text: Yamhi saccaṃ ca dhammo ca ahiṃsā saṃyamo damo\nSa ve vantamalo dhīro thero iti pavuccati

262.text: Na vākkaraṇamattena vaṇṇapokkharatāya vā\nSādhurūpo naro hoti issukī maccharī saṭho

263.text: Yassa ce taṃ samucchinnaṃ mūlaghaccaṃ samūhataṃ\nSa vantadoso medhāvī sādhurūpo ti vuccati

264.text: Na muṇḍakena samaṇo abbato alikaṃ bhaṇaṃ\nIcchālobhasamāpanno samaṇo kiṃ bhavissati

265.text: Yo ca sameti pāpāni aṇuṃ thūlāni sabbaso\nSamitattā hi pāpānaṃ samaṇo ti pavuccati

266.text: Na tena bhikkhū hoti yāvatā bhikkhate pare\nVissaṃ dhammaṃ samādāya bhikkhu hoti na tāvatā

267.text: Yo dha puññca pāpañca bāhetvā brahmacariyavā\nSaṅkhāya loke carati sa ce bhikkhū ti vuccati

268.text: Na monena muni hoti mūḷharūpo aviddasu\nYo ca tulaṃ va paggayha varamādāya paṇḍito

269.text: Pāpāni parivajjeti sa manī tena so muni\nYo munāti ubho loke muni tena pavuccati

270.text: Na tena ariyo hoti yena pāṇāni hiṃsati\nAhiṃsā sabbapāṇānaṃ ariyo ti pavuccati

271.text: Na sīlabbatamattena bāhusaccena vā pana\nAtha vā samādhilābhena vivicca sayanena vā

272.text: Phusāmi nekkhammasukhaṃ aputhujjanasevitaṃ\nBhikkhu vissāsamāpādi appatto āsavakkhayaṃ

273.text: Maggānaṭṭhaṅgiko seṭṭho saccānaṃ caturo padā\nVirāgo seṭṭho dhammānaṃ divipadānaṃ ca cakkhumā

274.text: Eso va maggo natthañño dassanassa visuddhiyā\nEtaṃ hi tumhe paṭipajjatha mārassetaṃ pamohanaṃ

275.text: Etaṃ hi tumhe paṭipannā dukkhassantaṃ karissatha\nAkkhāto ve mayā maggo aññāya sallasatthanaṃ

276.text: Tumhehi kiccaṃ ātappaṃ akkhātāro tathāgatā\nPaṭipannā pamokkhanti jhāyino mārabandhanā

277.text: Sabbe baṅkhārā aniccā ti yadā paññāya passati\nAtha nibbindati dukkhe esa maggo visuddhiyā

278.text: Sabbe baṅkhārā dukkhā ti yadā paññāya passati\nAtha nibbindati dukkhe esa maggo visuddhiyā

279.text: Sabbe dhammā anattā ti yadā paññāya passati\nAtha nibbindati dukkhe esa maggo visuddhiyā

280.text:
Uṭṭhānakālamhi anuṭṭhahāno
Yuvā balī ālasiyaṃ upeto
Saṃsannasaṅkappamano kusīto
Paññāya maggaṃ alaso na vindati

281.text:
Vācānurakkhī manasā susaṃvuto
Kāyena ca akusalaṃ na kayirā
Ete tayo kammapathe visodhaye
Ārādhaye maggaṃ isippaveditaṃ

282.text: Yogā ve jāti bhūri ayogā bhūrisaṅkhayo\nEtaṃ dvedhā pathaṃ ñatvā bhavāya vibhavāya ca\nTathattānaṃ niveseyya yathā bhūri pavaḍḍhati

283.text: Vanaṃ chindatha mā rukkhaṃ vanato jāyatī bhayaṃ\nChetvā vanañca vanathañca nibbanā hotha bhikkhavo

284.text: Yāvaṃ vanatho na chijjati anumatto pi narassa nārisu\nPaṭibaddhamano va tāva so vaccho khīrapako va mātari

285.text: Ucchinda sinehamattano kumudaṃ sāradikaṃ va pāṇinā\nSantimaggameva brūhaya nibbāṇaṃ sugatena desitaṃ

286.text: Idha vassaṃ vasissāmi idha hemanta gimbhisu\nIti bālo vicinteti antarāyaṃ na bujjhati

287.text: Taṃ puttapasusammattaṃ byāsattamanasaṃ naraṃ\nSuttaṃ gāmaṃ mahogho va maccu ādāya gacchati

288.text: Na santi puttā tāṇāya na pitā napi bandhavā\nAntakenādhipannassa natthi ñātisu tāṇatā

289.text: Etamatthavasaṃ ñatvā paṇḍito sīlasaṃvuto\nNibbāṇagamanaṃ maggaṃ khippameva visodhaye

290.text: Mattāsukhapariccāgā passe ce vipulaṃ sukhaṃ\nCaje mattāsukhaṃ dhīro sampassaṃ vipulaṃ sukhaṃ

291.text: Paradukkhūpadānena attano sukhamicchati\nVerasaṃsaggasaṃsaṭṭho verā so na parimuccati

292.text: Yaṃ hi kiccaṃ tadapaviddhaṃ akiccaṃ pana kayirati\nUnnalānaṃ pamattānaṃ tesaṃ vaḍḍhanti āsavā

293.text: Yesañca susamāraddhā niccaṃ kāyagatā sati\nAkiccaṃ te na sevanti kicce sātaccakārino\nSatānaṃ sampajānānaṃ atthaṃ gacchanti āsavā

294.text: Mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hantvā rājāno dve ca khattiye\nRaṭṭhaṃ sānuvaraṃ hantvā anīgho yāti brāhmaṇo

295.text: Mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hantvā rājāno dve ca sottiye\nVeyyagghapañcamaṃ hantvā anīgho yāti brāhmaṇo\n

296.text: Suppabuddhaṃ pabujjhanti sadā gotamasāvakā\nYesaṃ divā ca ratto ca niccaṃ buddhagatā sati

297.text: Suppabuddhaṃ pabujjhanti sadā gotamasāvakā\nYesaṃ divā ca ratto ca niccaṃ dhammagatā sati

298.text: Suppabuddhaṃ pabujjhanti sadā gotamasāvakā\nYesaṃ divā ca ratto ca niccaṃ saṅghagatā sati

299.text: Suppabuddhaṃ pabujjhanti sadā gotamasāvakā \r\nYesaṃ divā ca ratto ca niccaṃ kāyagatā sati

300.text: Suppabuddhaṃ pabujjhanti sadā gotamasāvakā\nYesaṃ divā ca ratto ca ahiṃsāya rato mano

301.text: Suppabuddhaṃ pabujjhanti sadā gotamasāvakā\nYesaṃ divā ca ratto ca bhāvanāya rato mano

302.text: Duppabbajjaṃ durabhiramaṃ durāvāsā gharā dukhā\nDukkhosamānasaṃvāso dukkhānupatitaddhagu\nTasmā na caddhagu siyā dukkhānupatito siyā

303.text: Saddho sīlena sampanno yasobhogasamappito\nYaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ bhajati tattha tattheva pūjito

304.text: Dūre santo pakāsanti himavanto va pabbato\nAsantettha na dissanti rattiṃ khittā yathā sarā

305.text: Ekāsanaṃ ekaseyyaṃ eko caramatandito\nEko damayamattānaṃ vanante ramito siyā

306.text: Abhūtavādī nirayaṃ upeti yo cāpi katvā na karomīti cāha\nUbho pi te pecca samā bhavanti nihīnakammā manujā parattha

307.text: Kāsāvakaṇṭhā bahavo pāpadhammā asaññatā\nPāpā pāpehi kammehi nirayaṃ te upapajjare

308.text: Seyye ayoguḷo bhutto tatto aggisikhūpamo\nYañce bhūñjeyya dussīlo raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ asaññato

309.text:
Cattāri ṭhānāni naro pamatto
Āpajjati paradārūpasevī
Apuññalābhaṃ na nikāmaseyyaṃ
Nindaṃ tatiyaṃ nirayaṃ catutthaṃ

310.text:
Apuññalābho ca gatī ca pāpikā
Bhītassa bhītāya ratī ca thokikā
Rājā ca daṇḍaṃ garukaṃ paṇeti
Tasmā naro paradāraṃ na seve

311.text: Kuso yathā duggahito hatthamevānukantati\nSāmaññaṃ dupparāmaṭṭhaṃ nirayāyupakaḍḍhati

312.text: Yaṃ kiñci sithilaṃ kammaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ ca yaṃ vataṃ\nSaṅkassaraṃ brahmacariyaṃ na taṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ

313.text: Kayirā ce kayirāthenaṃ daḷhamenaṃ parakkame\nSaṭhilo hi paribbājo bhiyyo ākirate rajaṃ

314.text: Akataṃ dukkataṃ seyyo pacchā tapati dukkataṃ\nKataṃ ca sukataṃ seyyo yaṃ katvā nānutappati

315.text: Nagaraṃ yathā paccantaṃ guttaṃ santarabāhiraṃ\nEvaṃ gopetha attānaṃ khaṇo vo mā upaccagā\nKhaṇātītā hi socanti nirayamhi samappitā

316.text: Alajjitāye lajjanti lajjitāye na lajjare\nMicchādiṭṭhisamādānā sattā gacchanti duggatiṃ

317.text: Abhaye bhayadassino bhaye cābhayadassino\nMicchādiṭṭhisamādānā sattā gacchanti duggatiṃ

318.text: Avajje vajjamatino vajje cāvajjadassino\nMicchādiṭṭhisamādānā sattā gacchanti duggatiṃ

319.text: Vajjaṃ ca vajjato ñatvā avajjaṃ ca avajjato\nSammādiṭṭhisamādānā sattā gacchanti suggatiṃ

320.text: Ahaṃ nāgo va saṅgāme cāpāto patitaṃ saraṃ\nAtivākyaṃ titikkhissaṃ dussīlo hi bahujjano

321.text: Dantaṃ nayanti samitiṃ dantaṃ rājā bhirūhati\nDanto seṭṭho manussesu yo tivākyaṃ titikkhati

322.text: Varamassatarā dantā ājānīyā ca sindhavā\nKuñjarā ca mahānāgā attadanto tato varaṃ

323.text: Na hi etehi yānehi gaccheyya agataṃ disaṃ\nYathāttanā sudantena danto dantena gacchati

324.text: Dhanapālako nāma kuñjaro kaṭukappabhedano dunnivārayo\nBaddho kabalaṃ na bhuñjati sumarati nāgavanassa kuñjaro

325.text: Middhī yadā hoti mahagghaso ca niddāyitā samparivattasāyī\nMahāvarāho va nivāpapuṭṭho punappunaṃ gabbhamupeti mando

326.text:
Idaṃ pure cittamacāri cārikaṃ
Yenicchakaṃ yatthakāmaṃ yathāsukhaṃ
Tadajjahaṃ niggahessāmi yoniso
Hatthippabhinnaṃ viya aṅkusaggaho

327.text: Appamādaratā hotha sacittamanurakkhatha\nDuggā uddharathattānaṃ paṅke sanno va kuñjaro

328.text:
Sace labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ
Saddhiṃ caraṃ sādhu vihāri dhīraṃ
Abhibhuyya sabbāni parissayāni
Careyya tenattamano satīmā

329.text:
No ce labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ
Saddhiṃ caraṃ sādhu vihāri dhīraṃ
Rājā va raṭṭhaṃ vijitaṃ pahāya
Eko care mātaṅgaraññe va nāgo

330.text:
Ekassa caritaṃ seyyo
Natthi bāle sahāyatā
Eko care na ca pāpāni kayirā
Appossukko mātaṅgaraññe va nāgo

331.text:
Atthamhi jātamhi sukhā sahāyā
Tuṭṭhī sukhā yā itarītarena
Puññaṃ sukhaṃ jīvitasaṅkhayamhi
Sabbassa dukkhassa sukhaṃ pahāṇaṃ

332.text: Sukhā matteyyatā loke atho petteyyatā sukhā\nSukhā sāmaññatā loke atho brahmaññatā sukhā

333.text: Sukhaṃ yāva jarā sīlaṃ sukhā saddhā patiṭṭhitā\nSukho paññāya paṭilābho pāpānaṃ akaraṇaṃ sukhaṃ

334.text: Manujassa pamattacārino taṇhā vaḍḍhati māluvā viya\nSo palavati hurāhuraṃ phalamicchaṃ va vanasmiṃ vānaro

335.text: Yā esā sahatī jammī taṇhā loke visattikā\nSokā tassa pavaḍḍhanti abhivaṭṭhaṃ va bīraṇaṃ

336.text: Yo ce taṃ sahatī jammiṃ taṇhaṃ loke duraccayaṃ\nSokā tamhā papatanti udabindū va pokkharā

337.text: Taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddaṃ vo yāvantettha samāgatā \r\nTaṇhāya mūlaṃ khaṇatha usīrattho bīraṇaṃ \r\nMā vo nalaṃ va soto va māro bhañji punappunaṃ

338.text:
Yathāpi mūle anupaddave daḷhe
Chinno pi rukkho punareva rūhati
Evampi taṇhānusaye anūhate
Nibbatti dukkhamidaṃ punappunaṃ

339.text: Yassa chattiṃsati sotā manāpassavanā bhūsā\nVāhā vahanti duddiṭṭhiṃ saṅkappā rāganissitā

340.text: Savanti sabbadhi sotā latā ubbhijja tiṭṭhati\nTañca disvā lataṃ jātaṃ mūlaṃ paññāya chindatha

341.text: Saritāni sinehitāni ca somanassāni bhavanti jantuno\nTe sātasitā sukhesino te ve jāti jarūpagā narā

342.text: Tasiṇāya purakkhatā pajā parisappanti saso va bādhito\nSaṃyojanasaṅgasattā dukkhamupenti punappunaṃ cirāya

343.text: Tasiṇāya purakkhatā pajā parisappanti saso va bādhito\nTasmā tasiṇaṃ vinodaya bhikkhu ākaṅkhī virāgamattano

344.text: Yo nibbanatho+ vanādhimutto vanamutto vanameva dhāvati\nTaṃ puggalametha passatha mutto bandhanameva dhāvati

345.text:
Na taṃ daḷhaṃ bandhanamāhu dhīrā
Yadāyasaṃ dārujaṃ babbajañca
Sārattarattā maṇikuṇḍalesu
Puttesu dāresu ca yā apekhā

346.text:
Etaṃ daḷhaṃ bandhanamāhu dhīrā
Ohārinaṃ sithilaṃ duppamuñcaṃ
Etampi chetvāna paribbajanti
Anapekkhino kāmasukhaṃ pahāya

347.text:
Ye rāgarattānupatanti sotaṃ
Sayaṃ kataṃ makkaṭako va jālaṃ
Etampi chetvāna vajanti dhīrā
Anapekkhino sabbadukkhaṃ pahāya

348.text: Muñca pure muñca pacchato majjhe muñca bhavassa pāragū\nSabbattha vimuttamānaso na puna jātijaraṃ upehisi

349.text: Vitakkapamathitassa jantuno tibbarāgassa subhānupassino\nBhiyyo taṇhā pavaḍḍhati esa kho daḷhaṃ karoti bandhanaṃ

350.text: Vitakkupasame ca yo rato asubhaṃ bhāvayati sadā sato\nEsa kho vyantikāhiti esa checchati mārabandhanaṃ

351.text: Niṭṭhaṃ gato asantāsī vītataṇho anaṅgaṇo\nAcchindi bhavasallāni antimo yaṃ samussayo

352.text: Vītataṇho anādāno niruttipadakovido\nAkkharānaṃ sannipātaṃ jaññā pubbaparāni ca\nSa ve antimasārīro mahāpañño mahāpuriso ti vuccati

353.text:
Sabbābhibhū sabbavidū hamasmi
Sabbesu dhammesu anūpalitto
Sabbañjaho taṇhakkhaye vimutto
Sayaṃ abhiññāya kamuddiseyyaṃ

354.text:
Sabbadānaṃ dhammadānaṃ jināti
Sabbaṃ rasaṃ dhammaraso jināti
Sabbaṃ ratiṃ dhammaratī jināti
Taṇhakkhayo sabbadukkhaṃ jināti

355.text: Hananti bhogā dummedhaṃ no ve pāragavesino\nBhogataṇhāya dummedho hanti aññe va attanā

356.text: Tiṇadosāni khettāni rāgadosā ayaṃ pajā\nTasmā hi vītarāgesu dinnaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ

357.text: Tiṇadosāni khettāni dosadosā ayaṃ pajā\nTasmā hi vītadosesu dinnaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ

358.text: Tiṇadosāni khettāni mohadosā ayaṃ pajā\nTasmā hi vītamohesu dinnaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ

359.text: Tiṇadosāni khettāni icchādosā ayaṃ pajā\nTasmā hi vigaticchesu dinnaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ

360.text: Cakkhunā saṃvaro sādhu sādhu sotena saṃvaro\nGhāṇena saṃvaro sādhu sādhu jivhāya saṃvaro

361.text: Kāyena saṃvaro sādhu sādhu vācāya saṃvaro\nManasā saṃvaro sādhu sādhu sabbattha saṃvaro\nSabbattha saṃvuto bhikkhu sabbadukkhā pamuccati

362.text:
Hattha saññato pādasaññato
Vācāya saññato saññatuttamo
Ajjhattarato samāhito
Eko santusito tamāhu bhikkhuṃ

363.text: Yo mukhasaññato bhikkhu mantabhāṇī anuddhato\nAtthaṃ dhammaṃ ca dīpeti madhuraṃ tassa bhāsitaṃ

364.text: Dhammārāmo dhammarato dhammaṃ anuvicintayaṃ\nDhammaṃ anussaraṃ bhikkhu saddhammā na parihāyati

365.text: Salābhaṃ nātimaññeyya nāññesaṃ pihayaṃ care\nAññesaṃ pihayaṃ bhikkhu samādhiṃ nādhigacchati

366.text: Appalābho pi ce bhikkhu salābhaṃ nātimaññati \r\nTaṃ ve devā pasaṃsanti suddhājīviṃ atanditaṃ

367.text: Sabbaso nāmarūpasmiṃ yassa natthi mamāyitaṃ\nAsatā ca na socati sa ve bhikkhū ti vuccati

368.text: Mettāvihārī yo bhikkhū pasanno buddhasāsane\nAdhigacche padaṃ santaṃ saṅkhārūpasamaṃ sukhaṃ

369.text: Siñca bhikkhu imaṃ nāvaṃ sittā te lahumessati\nChetvā rāgaṃ dosaṃ ca tato nibbāṇamehisi

370.text: Pañca chinde pañca jahe pañca cuttari bhāvaye\nPañcasaṅgātigo bhikkhu oghatiṇṇo ti vuccati

371.text:
Jhāya bhikkhu mā ca pāmado
Mā te kāmaguṇe bhamassu cittaṃ
Mā lohaguḷaṃ gilī pamatto
Mā kandi dukkhamidanti ḍayhamāno

372.text: Natthi jhānaṃ apaññassa paññā natthi ajhāyato\nYamhi jhānaṃ ca paññā ca sa ve nibbāṇasantike

373.text: Suññāgāraṃ paviṭṭhassa santacittassa bhikkhuno\nAmānusī rati hoti sammā dhammaṃ vipassato

374.text: Yato yato sammasati khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ\nLabhati pītipāmojjaṃ amataṃ taṃ vijānataṃ

375.text: Tatrāyamādi bhavati idha paññassa bhikkhuno\nIndriyagutti santuṭṭhī pātimokkhe ca saṃvaro

376.text: Mitte bhajassu kalyāṇe suddhājīve atandite\nPaṭisanthāravuttyassa ācārakusalo siyā\nTato pāmojjabahulo dukkhassantaṃ karissasi

377.text: Vassikā viya pupphāni maddavāni pamuñcati\nEvaṃ rāgaṃ ca dosaṃ ca vippamuñcetha bhikkhavo

378.text: Santakāyo santavāco santavā susamāhito\nVantalokāmiso bhikkhu upasanto ti vuccati

379.text: Attanā vodayattānaṃ paṭimāse ttamattanā\nSo attagutto satimā sukhaṃ bhikkhu vihāhisi

380.text: Attā hi attano nātho attā hi attano gati\nTasmā saññamayattānaṃ assaṃ bhadraṃ va vāṇijo

381.text: Pāmojjabahulo bhikkhu pasanno buddhasāsane\nAdhigacche padaṃ santaṃ saṅkhārūpasamaṃ sukhaṃ

382.text: Yo have daharo bhikkhu yuñjati buddhasāsane\nSo imaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti abbhā mutto va candimā

383.text: Chinda sotaṃ parakkamma kāme panuda brāhmaṇa\nSaṅkhārānaṃ khayaṃ ñatvā akataññū si brāhmaṇa

384.text: Yadā dvayesu dhammesū pāragū hoti brāhmaṇo\nAthassa sabbe saṃyogā atthaṃ gacchanti jānato

385.text: Yassa pāraṃ apāraṃ vā pārāpāraṃ na vijjati\nVītaddaraṃ visaṃyuttaṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

386.text: Jhāyiṃ virajamāsīnaṃ katakiccaṃ anāsavaṃ\nUttamatthaṃ anuppattaṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

387.text: Divā tapati ādicco rattiṃ ābhāti candimā\nSannaddho khattiyo tapati jhāyī tapati brāhmaṇo\nAtha sabbamahorattiṃ buddho tapati tejasā

388.text: Bāhitapāpo ti brāhmaṇo samacariyā samaṇo ti vuccati\nPabbājayattano malaṃ tasmā pabbajito ti vuccati

389.text: Na brāhmaṇassa pahareyya nāssa muñcetha brāhmaṇo\nDhī brāhmaṇassa hantāraṃ tato dhī yassa muñcati

390.text:
Na brāhmaṇassetadakiñci seyyo
Yadā nisedho manaso piyehi
Yato yato hiṃsamano nivattati
Tato tato sammati meva dukkhaṃ

391.text: Yassa kāyena vācāya manasā natthi dukkataṃ\nSaṃvutaṃ tīhi ṭhānehi tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

392.text: Yamhā dhammaṃ vijāneyya sammāsambuddhadesitaṃ\nSakkaccaṃ taṃ namasseyya aggihuttaṃ va brāhmaṇo

393.text: Na jaṭāhi na gottena jaccā hoti brāhmaṇo\nYamhi saccañca dhammo ca so sucī so va brāhmaṇo

394.text: Kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyā\nAbbhantaraṃ te gahaṇaṃ bāhiraṃ parimajjasi

395.text: Paṃsukūladharaṃ jantūṃ kisaṃ dhamanisanthataṃ\nEkaṃ vanasmiṃ jhāyantaṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

396.text: Na cāhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūmi yonijaṃ mattisambhavaṃ\nBhovādī nāma so hoti sace hoti sakiñcano\nAkiñcanaṃ anādānaṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

397.text: Sabbasaṃyojanaṃ chetvā yo ve na paritassati\nSaṅgātigaṃ vidaññuttaṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

398.text: Chetvā naddhiṃ varattañca sandāmaṃ sahanukkamaṃ\nUkkhittapalighaṃ buddhaṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

399.text: Akkosaṃ vadhabandhaṃ ca aduṭṭho yo titikkhati \r\nKhantibalaṃ balānīkaṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

400.text: Akkodhanaṃ vatavantaṃ sīlavantaṃ anussutaṃ \r\nDantaṃ antimasārīraṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

401.text: Vāri pokkharapatte va āraggeriva sāsapo\nYo na lippati kāmesu tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

402.text: Yo dukkhassa pajānāti idheva khayamattano\nPannabhāraṃ visaṃyuttaṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

403.text: Gambhīrapaññaṃ medhāviṃ maggāmaggassa kovidaṃ\nUttamatthaṃ anuppattaṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

404.text: Asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ gahaṭṭhehi anāgārehi cūbhayaṃ\nAnokāsariṃ appicchaṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

405.text: Nidhāya daṇḍaṃ bhūtesu tasesu thāvaresu ca\nYo na hanti na ghāteti tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

406.text: Aviruddhaṃ viruddhesu attadaṇḍesu nibbutaṃ\nSādānesu anādānaṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

407.text: Yassa rāgo ca doso ca māno makkho ca pātito\nSāsapo riva āraggā tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

408.text: Akakkasaṃ viññapaniṃ giraṃ saccaṃ udīraye\nYāya nābhisaje kañci tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

409.text: Yo dha dīghaṃ va rassaṃ vā aṇuṃ thūlaṃ subhāsubhaṃ\nLoke adinnaṃ nādiyati tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

410.text: Āsā yassa na vijjanti asmiṃ loke paramhi ca\nNirāsayaṃ visaṃyuttaṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

411.text: Yassālayā na vijjanti aññāya akathaṃkathī\nAmatogadhaṃ anuppattaṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

412.text: Yo dha puññca pāpañca ubho saṅgaṃ upaccagā\nAsokaṃ virajaṃ suddhaṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

413.text: Candaṃ va vimalaṃ suddhaṃ vippasannamanāvilaṃ\nNandībhavaparikkhīṇaṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

414.text: Yo imaṃ paḷipathaṃ duggaṃ saṃsāraṃ mohamaccagā\nTiṇṇo pāragato jhāyī anejo akathaṃkatī\nAnupādāya nibbuto tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

415.text: Yo dha kāme pahātvāna anāgāro paribbaje\nKāmabhavaparikkhīṇaṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

416.text: Yo dha taṇhaṃ pahātvāna anāgāro paribbaje\nTaṇhābhavaparikkhīṇaṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

417.text: Hitvā mānusakaṃ yogaṃ dibbaṃ yogaṃ upaccagā\nSabbayogavisaṃyuttaṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

418.text: Hitvā ratiṃ ca aratiṃ ca sītibhūtaṃ nirūpadhiṃ\nSabbalokābhibhuṃ vīraṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

419.text: Cutiṃ yo vedi sattānaṃ upapattiṃ ca sabbaso\nAsattaṃ sugataṃ buddhaṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

420.text: Yassa gatiṃ na jānanti devā gandhabbamānusā\nKhīṇāsavaṃ arahantaṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

421.text: Yassa pure ca pacchā ca majjhe ca natthi kiñcanaṃ\nAkiñcanaṃ anādānaṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

422.text: Usabhaṃ pavaraṃ vīraṃ mahesiṃ vijitāvinaṃ\nAnejaṃ nhātakaṃ buddhaṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ

423.text: Pubbenivāsaṃ yo vedī saggāpāyaṃ ca passati \r\nAtho jātikkhayaṃ patto abhiññāvosito muni \r\nSabbavositavosānaṃ tam ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ
